parameters.name: UserID
parameters.description: Unique, user-defined ID for the new flyout

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Name of the flyout to create

parameters.name: ToolTip
parameters.description: ToolTip for the new flyout

parameters.name: Hint
parameters.description: Text displayed in SOLIDWORKS Design status bar when a user's mouse pointer is over the flyout

parameters.name: SmallIcon
parameters.description: Path to the small bitmap or PNG used in the flyout

parameters.name: LargeIcon
parameters.description: Path to the large bitmap or PNG used in the flyout

parameters.name: SmallImageList
parameters.description: Path to the bitmap or PNG containing all of the small button and separator images for this flyout

parameters.name: LargeImageList
parameters.description: Path to the bitmap or PNG containing all of the large button and separator images for this flyout

parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Function to call when the flyout is selected

parameters.name: UpdateCallbackFunction
parameters.description: Optional update function that controls the state of the item; if specified, then SOLIDWORKS Design calls this function before displaying the item (see Remarks ) If this update function returns... Then the SOLIDWORKS Design... 0 Disables the item 1 Enables the item; this is the default state if no update function is specified

parameters.name: UserID
parameters.description: Unique, user-defined ID for the new flyout

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Name of the flyout to create

parameters.name: ToolTip
parameters.description: ToolTip for the new flyout

parameters.name: Hint
parameters.description: Text displayed in SOLIDWORKS Design status bar when a user's mouse pointer is over the flyout

parameters.name: SmallIcon
parameters.description: Path to the small bitmap or PNG used in the flyout

parameters.description: Path to the bitmap or PNG containing all of the small button and separator images for this flyout

parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Function to call when the flyout is selected

parameters.name: UpdateCallbackFunction
parameters.description: Optional update function that controls the state of the item; if specified, then SOLIDWORKS Design calls this function before displaying the item (see Remarks ) If this update function returns... Then the SOLIDWORKS Design... 0 Disables the item 1 Enables the item; this is the default state if no update function is specified

remarks:
After creating the flyout, display it on a CommandManager tab by calling
ICommandTabBox::AddCommands
. Call
IFlyoutGroup::AddContextMenuFlyout
to add it to context menus. Call
IFlyoutGroup::AddCommandItem
to add menu items to the flyout group.
If any flyout menu items are enabled, then the flyout button cannot be disabled by the flyout group's UpdateCallbackFunction. The sensitivity of the top-level flyout button is always determined by its enabled menu items. Disabled flyout menu items do not appear in the flyout menu. If there are no flyout menu items, then control of the top-level flyout button is returned to the flyout group's UpdateCallbackFunction.
